x-prompt.message: What date adapter would you like to use?

___projectName.x-prompt: Please enter the name of the project that will use the calendar (optional, will use the default project if not specified)
___projectName.description: Which project should the styles be added to

___module.x-prompt: Please enter a path to the NgModule that will use the calendar (relative to the root project directory, for example src/app/app.module.ts)
___module.description: Where to add the module import
